title: Educational buildings, hospitals, mental hospitals, maternity homes, house of correction, assembly b
clause_text: Educational buildings, hospitals, mental hospitals, maternity homes, house of correction, assembly buildings, mangalkaryalaya, markets, stadia, petrol filling and service stations: A minimum space 6 m wide shall be left open on all sides from the boundaries of the plot.
section: (6).Open spaces for various types of buildings-
